channel.title: Tech on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Tech on FinanClub

item.title: META
item.description: score:159 Chances: Strong short interest in Truth Social suggests a gloomy view of its future. Wall Street investors are particularly bullish on tech as AI transforms many companies’ operations. Meta Platforms, Inc. is introducing new Instagram policies which could impact political content. Meta’s Oversight Board has recommended changes to the handling of the Arabic term ‘shaheed’, potentially affecting the company’s content moderation practices.

item.title: ORCL
item.description: score:231 Chances: Oracle (ORCL) has been recognized as a Leader in the IDC MarketScape: U.S. Electronic Health Record (EHR) 2023-2024 Vendor Assessment, indicating potential for growth in the healthcare sector. Leading healthcare organizations are implementing Oracle Fusion Cloud Applications Suite, suggesting a potential increase in customer base and revenue.
